card.description: Survey of customers in a poke shop on whether or not they like certain poke combinations

context.potentialUses: Help make recommendations for what kind of poke a new customer should buy

fields.description: Does the poke have avocado mixed in?
Does the poke have onion mixed in?
Does the poke have masago mixed in?
Does the poke have wasabi mixed in?
Does the poke have ginger mixed in?
Does the poke have seaweed mixed in?
Does the poke have furikake mixed in?
Does the poke have surimi mixed in?
Does the poke have chili mixed in?
Do you like or dislike the poke?
